scripts.export: next build && next export && next-image-export-optimizer && touch out/.nojekyll
scripts.delete-original-media-from-export: rm out/images/contributions-media/*/*.JPG & rm out/images/contributions-media/*/*.jpg & rm out/images/contributions-media/*/*.JPEG & rm out/images/contributions-media/*/*.jpeg & rm out/images/contributions-media/*/*.png & rm out/images/contributions-media/*/*.PNG
